venue.name: Hess Gas - Intersection Mass Pike, Rt 128, and Commonwealth Ave

item.description:
Hi,

As some of you are aware Bob is doing much better after his collision with a Cage... he is purchasing a Yamaha TMAX (that is a picture of Bob on his new ride,well maybe not as cool... ). We plan to ride out there to pick up his new scoot then ride to Amherst for Judies Popovers.

When Bob was asked if he wanted to go to Bubbas BBQ (where rough tough motorcyclists hang out ) or get Judies Popovers, he responded with " We are scooter people, of course we choose popovers ! :-) )

We will Leave Hess Express at 8:45 AM arrive there approx 10:15AM

Mutual Enterprises, Inc.
255 Berkshire Ave.
Springfield, MA 01109

Should be fun and we have the weather... Doug
item.name: Pick Up Bobs Tmax Ride -- with Amherst Judies Popovers on the way home....
